Uses of Class
com.skobbler.ngx.map.SKBoundingBox

  • Packages that use SKBoundingBox 
    Package Description
    com.skobbler.ngx.map
    Constains classses needed to show the map and information on the map.
    com.skobbler.ngx.map.realreach
    Contains classes needed to for implement RealReach feature.
    com.skobbler.ngx.trail
    Contains classses needed to show trails
    com.skobbler.ngx.util
    Constains utility classes

      Gets the bounding box with the center corresponding to the provided GPS position and zoom.

      Gets the bounding box of the current real reach area displayed on the map

      Modifier and Type Method and Description

      Sets the visible region of the map so that a provided coordinate bounding box will be visible.

      Sets the view at real reach given a certain bounding box.
